text:
Saya menginap di hotel ini selama 3 hari 2 malam. Saya memesan kamar dengan tipe 2 bedrooms executive. Saya menginap di hotel ini selama masa pandemi, hotel ini telah menerapkan beberapa protokol COVID, seperti misalnya pengecekan suhu kepada setiap tamu, adanya tanda di dalam lift untuk selalu menjaga jarak, selain itu diletakkan nya hand sanitizer di beberapa titik yang sering dijamah oleh para tamu. Namun untuk di kaamar, saya belum menemukan adanya sanitizing healthy kit yang seharusnya sudah disediakan oleh pihak hotel kepada tiap tamu dan sudah tersedia didalam kamar. Sanitizing health kit ini seharusnya terdiri dari hand sanitizer, masker,serta sanitizing wipes. Hotel ini memiliki tempat yang strategis sekali yakni di daerah Kuningan, dan hotel ini memiliki akses langsung menuju shopping mall Lotte Avenue dan ini sangat memudahkan para tamu apabila ingin berkunjung ke mall tersebut. Kesan pertama pada saat check in, lobby terasa sangat pans sekali, dikarenakan pada saat itu pendingin udara di dalam lobby sedang tidak berfungsi dengan baik, yang kedua yang bikin sya kaget, staff hotel sangatlah ramah sekali, namun menurut saya, cara penyampaian segala sesuatu kepada tamu, menurut saya agak kurang sopan seperti misalnya, resepsionis menyampaikan untuk mencopy KTP saya, pihak resepsionis mengatakan baik pak, aku akan mengcopy identitas bapak, alangkah lebih baik, dikatakan dengan menggunakan saya akan mengcopy identitas bapak, jangan menggunakan kata "aku", karena menurut saya ini hotel bertaraf bintang 5. Kesan pertama memasuki kamar, kamar terasa cukup luas dan lega, kualitas kasur tentu tidak usa diragukan lagi. Sangat nyaman dan sangat empuk, Staff sangatlah tanggap sekali apabila kita memerlukan sesuatu, Namun ada beberapa hal yang perlu diperbaiki, seperti misalnya mesin cuci yang sering kalu trouble disaat kita sedang menggunakan, dan harus memanggil pihak engineering berkali kali, selain itu atap plafion yang terkesan agak usang dan sedikit merembes, alangkah lebih baik untuk diperbaiki dan dilakukan maintenance secara rutin. Selain itu sofa yang ada di ruang keluarga, hampir saja jebol,m dikarenakan setiap ingin di duduki, selalu timbul bunyi keras sekali.Selain itu, di master bedroom pun tidak disediakan hair dryer sehingga kita harus meminta ke pihak hotel untuk menyiapkan hair dryer di dalam kamar.  Tapi selebihnya sangat oke sekali, semoga kedepan dapat diperbaiki untuk menjadi lebih baik lagi, 

GOOD JOB ASCOTT KUNINGAN!!
title: Bagus sih, tapi harus ada beberapa hal yag perlu diperbaiki

text:
Kalau bawa keluarga dan mau dekat mall, ascott kuningan ini bisa jadi pilihan banget.

Lengkaaaaap banget isi kamarnya.

Dan yang paling aku suka disini adalah ada mesin cuci dan disediakan DETERGENNYA 💖

Hal kecil yang bikin wow. 
Kenapa? Karna pernah juga nginep di hotel model apartemen gini, yang lengkap juga tapi yah ga ada disediakan detergen.
Jadi yah ga ada niat juga jadinya buat nyuci. Ini sangat membantu jadi mengurangi cucian saat pulang ke rumah buat saya yang non ART 😂

Hotel ini langsung connecting ke mall lotte shopping avenue, melalui H&M, yang rada riskan.
Tadinya ga mau liat liat disana ‘terpaksa’ liat liat 😆

Kamar luas, ada ruang keluarga, dapur dan meja makan. 
Dan kamar mandi yang lengkap.

Yang agak mengecewakan disini hanya sarapannya, pilihan menunya sedikit sekali dan agak dingin.
Pilihan untuk anak anak pun limited.

Tapi Staff disini ramah ramah dan helpful. Terima kasih.

So its a YAY for staycation, tapi untuk menu sarapannya bisa lebih diperhatikan lagi.
title: YAY for staycation NAY for breakfast

text: Hotel yang terkoneksi dengan mall Lotte Shopping Avenue ini tergolong mewah, dikawasan Kuningan 1 gerbang dengan Raffles Hotel. Fasilitasnya cukup lengkap. Tampilan hotel yang seperti appartment bisa memilih 1 room atau 2 room. dilengkapi dengan Kamar mandi. Saya memilih yang 2 bedroom fasilitasnya 2 kamar mandi, 1 didalam kamar utama dan ada bathtub, 1 lagi di luar cukup luas. semua amenitiesnya l'occitane. Fasilitas kolam renangnya cukup besar terpisah antara anak-anak dan dewasa. Ruang makan terkoneksi dengan kolam renang. Banyak tempat bersantai bila berlibur bersama keluarga. ada fasilitas fitnes dan kids club juga lounge. Untuk fasilitas kamar selain kamar tidur dan kamar mandi dilengkapi dengan dapur, meja makan, living room juga kulkas,mesin cuci, dan setrika. kita juga bisa menyeja box baby bila dibutuhkan.

text:
Hi Readers....

Sebenernya udah 3 kali gw nginep disini. 
Yang pertama nginep secara terencana sama keluarga, ambil 1 unit dgn 2 kamar. Kesan pertama pas masuk ke dlm unit, "wow" krn perlengkapan rumah serba Ada. Kamar sangat nyaman dan gak berisik, jadi email buat istirahat.

Yang kedua kali nginep disini utk urusan kantor & dapet type kamar yang sama, jadi udh gak ada efek "wow"nya lagi.

Yang ketiga, nginep disini tanpa rencana sama keluarga krn kebetulan istri ada acara di Lotte avenue dan selesai udh cukup larut. Males cari hotel yang lain jadi akhirnya coba cari kamar di Ascott dan kebetulan msh ada yang kosong.
Karena dadakan dan cuma buat tidur doang jadi ambil unit yang 1 kamar. 
Secara kelengkapan sama seperti unit yang 2 kamar.

Overall, cukup nyaman buat istirahat, pelayanan cukup bagus krn waktu nginep pertama kali sempet ada masalah dgn AC dan cukup cepet ditanggapi oleh pihak maintenance.
Menurut gw hal yang agak kurang adalah dlm hal makanan, baik ragam maupun kualitas rasanya.
Bfast menu sangat terbatas pilihan menunya dan kualitas rasanya dibawah standar.

I think that's all from me.
See you on the next review.

Cheers,
Rama Permana
title: Nyaman untuk istirahat

owner_response.text:
Dear Suyan L,
Terima kasih atas reviewnya di TripAdvisor. Kami sangat menyayangkan perihal kesalahan komunikasi yang telah terjadi. Seperti yang telah kami jelaskan melalui email terpisah, kamar yang sudah dialokasikan untuk Anda adalah benar kamar Premier kami. Kami yakinkan bahwa kami menjunjung tinggi etika bisnis dan tidak akan pernah melakukan downgrade atas reservasi yang sudah kami terima tanpa persetujuan kedua belah pihak. Kamar Premier kami memang berbeda-beda ukuran dan viewnya, dan kami pastikan untuk kunjungan Anda berikutnya, kami akan alokasikan kamar Premier lain yang menjadi preferensi Anda.
Untuk perihal makanan sarapan dan room service, kami mohon maaf yang sebesar-besarnya karena konsistensi yang kurang. Kami yakinkan bahwa ini bukanlah standar kami dan kami akan melakukan perbaikan secepatnya untuk memastikan kepuasan semua tamu kami.
Sekali lagi kami ucapkan terima kasih atas feedback yang telah diberikan sebagai pacuan kepada kami untuk lebih meningkatkan kualitas pelayanan kami. Kami harap kami tetap akan diberikan kesempatan berikutnya untuk membuktikan bahwa kami telah melakukan peningkatan service kami.
Salam hormat,
Evelyne K.

text:
Ketika datang ke unit 1211 (16/12/2016), sewaktu saya mau berendam di bathtub, ketika airnya penuh agak kaget melihat kaya semacam pasir di bathtub tersebut dan jumlahnya lumayan banyak, lalu saya urungkan untuk berendam dan memilih mandi shower saja.

Tapi karena pasangan saya ingin berendam, saya coba sarankan menyalakan keran airnya pelan2 saja, mungkin tidak ada kotoran yg akan keluar. Tapi hasilnya sama saja.

Lalu menjelang sore, (khususnya di kamar mandi, dan di dapur tempat cuci piring) mulai mengeluarkan bau tak sedap semacam bau septic tank/bau air dan itu sampai ke ruang tv jika pintu kamar mandi tidak ditutup.

Kami kira bau nya akan hilang, tapi ternyata sampai pagi belum hilang2. akhirnya pagi2 kami complain dan hanya di beri pengharum ruangan saja.

itu saja sih, selebihnya mewah selayaknya hotel berbintang.

text:
The great service started before we landed. We had email asking for an early check in and our request was acceded due to availability.

We arrived at the hotel and were greeted by their friendly reception staff. Check in was a breeze and were informed of our the amenities. Something I like.

The executive room was great with a beautiful view and very clean. The bathrooms were very clean with a bathtub. Wifi  was very good and no blindspots.

The mall has a private connection to Lotte mall which is an added bonus. The mall itself was great and carrying baggage to the hotel made it seems seamless.

The staff were also friendly and made an effort to make our style memorable.  They advised on local services e.g. where to buy lapis cake as well as where were the nice chill out bars were. You may also request of room massage from Somerset hotel or walk over which is a 3 min walk. Massage was gd and worth it.

Simply said, my wife and i were impressed and were definitely staying with Ascot again.

P.s breakfast spread was ok due to the lack of variety according to my wife But I was ok with it. It had what I required.
title: Great Hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear Sean N,

Thank you very much for your recent stay at Ascott Kuningan Jakarta and sharing your wonderful feedback to TripAdvisor community.

We are pleased to hear your satisfaction on our strategic location as well as friendliness of the staff, your review and recommendation is highly appreciated and we do look forward to welcoming you back on your next stay.

For the breakfast issue, I personally following it up with our breakfast vendor to improved the breakfast variety. Once again, thank you for your support from all of us at Ascott Kuningan Jakarta, 

Thank you and Regards,

A. Haris Sumarwan
Act. Residence Manager

text:
overall had a nice stay in this serviced apartment!
good side : rooms is big enough for families with 2 kids, room is clean, designed nicely and effectively. good swimming pool, there's one pool for kids, outdoor playground and good indoor playroom.

bad side : 
1. We arrived around 5 pm (thanks to the massive traffic jam in Kuningan area!) and we requested for baby cot in our room (we have noted it in our booking request). However, it took such a long time for the baby cot to arrive in our room (we waited for like 3 hrs), that our baby was already asleep when the staff had the baby cot delivered :(
2. very limited bathroom amenities. only 1 set of toothbrush (?? do you expect us to share toothbrush?), very limited soap. 5 stars hotels will give 2 sets of toothbrush.
3. The TV in our room had problems so we asked for technician to fix it. Again, it took such a long time for the technican to arrive (we waited like 2hrs or so). Thank God the technician was very nice and polite and he solved the problem fast.

despite the negatives, I enjoyed staying in Ascott Kuningan. Hope they can improve their service
title: Good apartment hotel for families with kids

text:
Stayed here for a couple of days. Positives: location, cleanliness, size of apartment, decoration and furniture, good WiFi. Negatives: floorplan not optimal, kitchen not fully equipped.
Jakarta is very spread out, and travelling from place can take a long time. The hotel's location is quite good, in the Kuningan area, with much of central Jakarta a short taxi ride away. On top of that, the hotel is connected to the Lotte Shopping Avenue shopping mall (take lift to the 2nd floor, enter the H&M store kids section, proceed to other parts of the mall.) There are maybe 20 restaurants in the mall, a cinema, a good supermarket, and lots of other stores. This is a main reason for preferring this hotel over others.
The apartment itself is nicely decorated, but, disappointingly, 2/3rds of the window wall is taken by the bedroom, and the living room has only 1/3rd of it. Seems like the highest priority was to get the bedroom right, but while living in this type of place, most of the time is spent in the living and dining area, which, then, sadly, is not as nice as it could be. The living/dining area has a circular table with 4 chairs, and a quite small sofa for max. 2 persons (there would definitely be room for a more reasonable sofa!). The study nook with a small desk is at the window. OK, difficult to come up with a perfect floor plan when there is only a limited amount of window wall available, but I did not like the result here: the shape of the living/dining area is wrong, and much of the apartment is useless corridor-type area with no use. (Floorplans inside the hotel vary, so maybe our 1-bedroom was particularly bad, and others are better.)
Other than that, we were quite happy with the apartment. There are large TVs in the living area and in the bedroom, the kitchen has a fridge, stove, microwave oven, dish washer, and there was a washing machine in the closet-like outdoor area next to the study nook. The kitchen had plates, glasses etc. for 2 persons, which was a bit too little and impractical, even if there were only 2 persons staying.
The 11th floor has a good-size swimming pool for adults, and a tiny pool suitable for 2-4 year olds. Our 6-year old was unhappy with both: he cannot swim, and considered the kids' pool too small and childish. On the 10th floor there were additionally tennis and baseball courts, and a small playground for 2-4-year olds. Seemed nice.
The hotel breakfast was reasonable, not very extensive (a bit below average among similar 4+ star hotels and apartment hotels in Jakarta), but I found everything I wanted.
I would consider staying here again, but could try to find out about the floorplan first (or, maybe, it was not really that bad, after all, after getting used to it.) There are other similar (apartment) hotels nearby, but some of them are older and not as nice, and some of them are quite a bit more expensive. Many hotels in Jakarta have a far worse location. Some are within a short walking distance from Lotte, but there are not that many that are directly connected to a good shopping mall (and most of them, like the Hotel Indonesia Kempinski, are far more expensive to stay in.)
title: good apartment hotel with restaurants and shops only one minute away

text:
If you are looking for a small apartment with full functionality and a central location, the Ascott can be the perfect choice.
The Hotel is located in the complex Lotte World and provides direct access to a nice Shopping mall - with even more Shopping malls nearby. 
The Hotel itself does not have a Restaurant (apart from the space where breakfast is served), but that is irrelevant as the mall offers enough options. Also you wont find a spa - but there is a reasonably priced one opposite at the Somerset. The pool and Fitness Areas are spacious and nice.
Breakfast is lousy but that is normal for all apartment Hotels. So dont expect a rich good breakfast with a lot of variety.
The staff is friendly and helpful.
The apartment offers a nice kitchen, a dining area, a living room area, a sufficiently spacious bedroom, washing machine and a bathroom with bathtub and shower. If only the hairdryer would not make a sound like a siren.

Laundry is pretty expensive for an apartment Hotel and the room Service menu has space for improvement.

All in all a good choice if you are not into 5-star-hotel-facilities, but want to have a temporary home.
title: Excellent choice for a stay in Jakarta

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr./Mrs. W V,

text: This is my 5th visit to Ascott kuningan. comparing with our first stay, our recent stay was not really perfect. I mean, the room is good, the services also good. but, there was few detail has left over, such dvd remote didnt work; toilet sink didnt work properly; and couple of times front desk called us in our room, asking about our planning to extent our stay, which we already booked for 2 nights, so we definitely will stay. so i guess, lack of communication between front desk became a problem.
title: The best serviced apartment, Please Keep up the Good Work

owner_response.text:
Dear Frank W,
Thank you for your feedback.  It is always a distinct delight to welcome back frequent guests and thank you for giving me that honour.  We are happy to have met your expectations in service and quality standards despite the shortfalls experienced. 
The unpleasant experience with housekeeping and the front desk is truly regretted.  While we constantly strive to maintain the highest standards of customer satisfaction, regrettably, on this occasion, we have fallen short of our key objective. I therefore wish to extend to you my sincere apologies.
I would like to assure you that I have personally addressed these issues with the team for further improvements.  I also discovered that we failed to check you had 2 separate reservations hence the follow up by the front desk.  We will ensure that the team receives the necessary guidance to perform a much better role moving forward to avoid a recurrence of this incident. 
Unfortunately, there is no way of reversing the unpleasant incident you experienced. However, I can assure you that we value your feedback and your feedback has been utilised to improve our service and communication.  I hope you will see a difference on future stays.
Separately, may I also take this opportunity to invite you to become a member of Ascott Online Advantage, our online community to enjoy exclusive year-long discounts, seasonal promotions and special benefits at all properties under the Ascott, Somerset and Citadines brands.  Registration is easy and free. Go to our website and sign up now.
Thank you for staying with us and look forward to your next stay.

Regards
Manjindar

text:
Because of work, me and my boyfriend stay here for at least 3 days a week since last Sep. The location is great, room is lovely, we love the convenience.
However, we find it so hard to communicate with the staffs, they consistently failed on very simple task. Such as taking a long time to call for a car, can't get the reservation right, didn't bring all the laundry to us and so on. Mostly are caused by poor English, sometimes, they pretended that they understood us, but actually they would just do nothing about it. I can go on and on about all these.
And after so long staying here, they just surprise you by "Oh, we can't give you a small bottle of body lotion cause it's only for long-stay guests".. HAHAHA, I just want to Laugh Out Loud! They have to really figure out how to improve it, if not the hotel is only a nice hotel building, but without any service a luxury hotel should have.
title: Great Location and Rooms, Service is not up to the standard

owner_response.text:
Dear Veronica W,
Thank you for sharing your feedback.  At the Ascott, we strive hard to meet our guests expectations.  So it is with sincere regret to note your concerns regarding the service you experienced.  Thank you to bring these matters to my attention and I apologise for the shortfalls experienced.
Your comments are being taken seriously and have also been shared with the relevant departments for their attention in an aim to improve further.  Amenities such as soap and body lotion are indeed available on request at no extra charge and I apologise that the information conveyed was inaccurate.    Rest assured appropriate measures will be taken to address this problem and prevent future occurrences.   
The inappropriate service level you experienced is certainly unintentional and regrettable.    We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again and also to ensure that better services are provided.

Regards
Manjindar

text:
Had expected much more from Ascott since it was my first experience. Overall stay was pleasant but much more could be done. 
Pros:
The check-in and check-out was fast. Room was huge as I had booked a Premier suite. 
This property definitely had one of the most comfortable beds. 
Wifi signals are great by Jakarta standards
Room was clean and well kept.
Shopping mall is 5 minutes away and walking distance to Mega Kuningan area.
Ruth Chris steakhouse is across from the hotel
Great security
Nice Pool and landscaping
Cons
No mini bar
No currency exchange (Nearest opens at 10am but I was unlucky as they couldn't get rates till 11am and I had to get to the airport by 11:30am)
No 24 hour room service
Breakfast spread is lesser than a 3-star hotel (think of breakfast here as a Holiday Inn Express ++)
Regular coffee served is terrible; go for the expressos instead
The only restaurant, On Eleven is extremely small.
Room service ends at 11pm.
Dirty cups and dirty kettle 
Towels feels kinda old
Shampoo by L'Occitane was cool touch but other toiletries are all wrapped up in a cardboard container..
title: Disappointed

owner_response.text:
Dear CSTanK, 
Thank you for sharing your feedback on your recent stay.  We are happy to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us despite some disappointments. 
At the same time, we always appreciate having our guests bring to our attention, as you have done, what has not met with their expectations.  We are sorry for your disappointment in the matters you highlighted.  The comments on breakfast has been shared with our vendor for improvements.  We serve a continental spread for breakfast with a selection of hot dishes daily.  As we are not a full-fledged hotel, dining services ends at 11pm, however, in the near future, we are planning to extend room service until 1am.  We have also noted your observations in cleanliness and my team will pay extra attention on these matters.
Ascott is always committed in providing a high level of services and facilities to our guests and we will work even harder to regain trust and confidence from guests who were disappointed. Thank you again for sharing your experience and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  As this was your first stay, we sincerely hope you will give us another chance or you may contact me personally so I can look after your stay.
Separately, may I also invite you to register as an Ascott online member. As a member of Ascott Online Advantage, you enjoy exclusive year-long discounts, seasonal promotions and special benefits. Registration is easy and free. Log on to the Ascott website and sign up now.

Regards

text:
This is my second stay on the property. My first stay was to celebrate new year eve, second stay was for family fun weekends. It is started with a stinky room, as soon as we are entered the room, we could smell something is wrong, but we try to accept and sleep with it. However, next morning, smell is really annoying. I need to call front desk to get for room replacement, luckily everything was done properly and quickly.

Breakfast was also mediocre, I think they outsource it to someone else, because food quality is completely low. My daughter even feels sick straight away after consuming some of the food. 

As this is my second stay, I can feel that this property is downgrading quickly from my previous visit. From staff, services, facilities, and cleanliness, everything is going down. 

The only good thing that I can find is basketball court and mini garden inside the property. 

Well. I guess this would be my last stay on the property. As hotel enthusiastic, I might find another property which will be better and give more credit for loyal customers.
title: It's getting worse

text:
We stayed in a two bedroom apartment for four nights during our recent trip to Jakarta. We had chosen it because a serviced apartment was cheaper for our party of four than two hotel rooms in a good hotel. I also wanted a place which was connected to a mall because of the awful traffic in Jakarta and I didn't want to waste time going out just to buy food or necessities. Ascott kuningan fulfilled all these requirements and more. The apartment was lovely with a nice kitchen, laundry facilities and spacious rooms for all of us. There is also an aqua water dispenser in the apartment which saves you from having to buy water. The daily breakfast was not extensive but tasty. 

The ascott is linked to lotte mall on the second floor and convenient access to the supermarket, bakeries, the pharmacy, restaurants and a huge food court. This access became a lifeline when my mom came down with an upset stomach and we went to buy medicine and food.

The service was also good - responsive and warm. Highly recommended!
title: Wonderful base

text: Stayed there for 1 night. Aug 24-25. Arrived at 2 PM, couldn't check in until 4 and that was only because I started complaining, otherwise I would have to wait for God knows how much longer. I stayed there to attend an event in the building next to the hotel, held on the same day at 6 PM. So they lost me a couple hours of good rest there. As I said in my review of Louis Kienne, problems can happen at any hotel but its how we handle it that matters. They shoulda upgraded me when the room wasnt ready by 3 PM, not waited until I started raising my voice. And when I asked to talk to the GM, s/he never had the courtesy to see me but sent a plate of fruit instead. Did they want me to talk to the apple or something? So, as opposed to my review on Louis Kienne, this time I am not too impressed by my experience during my first stay at Ascott Kuningan.
title: Late Check IN

My Front Office Manager Handrian decided to upgrade you when you had returned from the mall when your room was again not available due to a maintenance issue.  He was the one who escorted you to your room.

text:
I choose the appart-hotel because of its location.  it is located within the Lotte shopping complex (so is the Raffles - neighbour hotel). This shopping complex offers everything in all possible price categories.
The appartment are large.  Prices are expensive for bookings up to 3 nights.  There is a considerable reduction for bookings for 4 nights or more.
Breakfast is bad.  I only took a coffee and walked away, then I went to the supermarked and bought everything necessary to make my own breakfast for the rest of the week.  Yes that bad.  This  breakfast is outsourced to a third party company and they don't do good the Ascott brand.  I suggest the Ascott boss(es) look into the breakfast concept at the Citadines in Makati.  It is also third party but excellent and refreshingly new.
The rooms are not maintained, resulting in lots of problems.  I moved twice rooms.  The sliding doors are impossible to use, the quality of the kitchen is terrible, AC is or to hot or too cold, my fridge had to be exchanged, the safe was not working and the room had a sewerage smell.
It's a shame because the lay out is good, the staff is really going the extra mile to help but this is not enough to compensate for the room maintenance problems.  I will not stay here anymore until the problems are being taken care off.
title: Lots of maintenance issues

owner_response.text:

Carefully selected, we expect a brand new refreshing take on our daily breakfast quality.

I hope the issues you faced were dealt with during your stay and I am sincerely embarrassed you had to move twice.  I have addressed your concerns to the relevant parties to avoid a recurrence as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our service.  Rest assured this is not our usual service offerings.

text:
I regularly stay in the Kuningan area but it was my first time at the Ascott here.

The hotel is flanked by the Ciputra mall and the Raffles. The location can get a little confusing as there are so many roads going on there.

The lobby is pretty small and check in took much longer than expected, especially after a long flight from Shanghai and a 1 hour ride from the airport. 
The staff are courteous and the rooms are HUGE. I was in a 1bed exec apartment and it had more than enough space for 3. 

There are a few niggling problems such as the flush which tended to get stuck often, and a loose tile in the room.

Also, there is no direct access to the mall but they are working on it. There are no restaurants in the hotel and no 24 hour room service. I hope these are can be addressed soon as it is a good value for money property in a great location.
title: Great location, facilities are still Work in progress

text:
Stayed here during our 2 days staycation with my wife and two kids age 5 and 2 respectively. We stayed here before and love the hotel so much. Now it becomes our family favorite hotel  for many reason:

- Humongous space (1 Bedroom Executive), it has master bedroom with TV, living room with TV and DVD player, dinner table, kitchen and service area.
- Fridge, dishwasher,  water dispenser, washing machine, microwave along with complete silverware.
-Kids playground, though it is not big. 
-Kids Club, though I have not tried it.
-Pool, Tennis Court, Half of basketball court
-The hotel also connected to Lotte Shopping Avenue which is very convenient if you are looking for lunch or dinner as the hotel restaurant is only open for breakfast 

The only cons we have is that the hotel failed to provide the baby cot despite our request when we booked the room. They did apologized since all the baby cots already been taken due to high occupancy at that period

Nevertheless. we feel like at home during our stays. Definitely will come back

text:
We booked Executive Room.but the reception upgraded us to Premier Room. Nice start.

Roomy apartment style accomodation. There is a dining area, sitting area with flat-scren TV and wide channels selection. Big walk-in closet. A bigger bathroom. There is even a separate pantry area complete with microwave, rice cooker and dishwasher. Oh yes, I forgot to mention the in-room laundry machine in case you need to. Detergent provided.

Location is nice. Just outside the restricted traffic zone but easy access to the business district. Expect some traffic jams during rush hours.

Breakfast spread is nice with the usual fare. It is served is a tiny venue with the possibilty of overflow into the pool terrace area.

Other food options (and shopping) is just an elevator away. This hotel is situation in the upper floors of the Ciputra World Shopping Mall. Easy access makes this one of our choices for a convenient and nice weekend getaway.
title: Nice Weekend Getaway

text:
Booked through booking.com for 3 nights. Staff was very helpful and friendly. There's even a guard post with security checks for cars at the main gate of the building. Also, Chinese Embassy was just around the corner so safety wouldn't be an issue as there were quite a number of police officers patrolling. 

One great thing about the apartment is the access corridor in 2/F with Lotte Shopping Avenue just next to H&M. You could avoid all the heat and rain walking outdoor. Wtihin 10-minute of walk there's ITC mall with Carrefour & Ambassador Mall so it's easy to buy food and virtually anything you need there. Price is much cheaper than Lotte.  

The apartment was VERY spacious, clean and very well furnished. They had everything you needed for daily need e.g. washing machine in a separated balcony (I love that in tropical countries!), IH stoves, mircrowave & drinking water machine. Utensils weren't extremely clean so you'd better wash them with the detergent provided. Wifi was free with reasonable speed in Indonesia. I especially liked their separated air-con for living room & bedroom so you could control the temperature in each room. Bathroom was very spacious, clean & odorless (which was quite common in hotels in developing countries). I like the washlet in the toilet.  

Swimming pool and gym room were very well managed. They didn't have a closet in the male changing room though. 

Special attention must be paid to the hotel name & location. Even blue bird taxi drivers & call centre were not very sure about the apartment as there's another Ascott Hotel in Jakarta. Emphasize it's Ascott KUNINGAN near Lotte Shopping Avenue in Jalan Dr. Santrio and it should be fine.   Or ask the driver to drop you off at Lotte and walk through the access corridor to apartment which I think it's less hassle.
title: Fantastic Apartment with Great Value for Money!

owner_response.text:
Dear Michaelchs,
Thank you for the stunning review.  I read your review with immense interest.  The quality and privacy of a serviced residence compared to a hotel, the surroundings, the direct pedestrian link to the shopping mall next door are unique points that our first time and returned guests including business guests have grown to enjoy.
Ascott Kuningan is indeed next to Lotte Shopping Avenue and opposite Somerset Grand Citra which is our sister property.  Ascott is fairly new and there may be instances some taxi drivers may not be familiar, thus it is always easier to either mention Lotte Shopping Mall at Ciputra World 1 or Somerset Grand Citra.  I hope these directions will be helpful for your future stays on business.
Thank you very much once again for your vote of confidence.  My team and I look forward to another opportunity to host you.

Warm regards
Manjindar

text:
The room - We got a deluxe one room apartment which is large and spacious.It has a living room, a bedroom, a toilet with tub and separate shower, a small storeroom and small dining area. And as expected of the Ascott brand, everything that is needed for a long (more than 3 days) stay is available, including the washer+dryer (a godsent),  iron+board and international power socket (incase you'd forgotten to bring the socket adapter like me). I love the fact that there is room to run around without going to the gym. Great strong wifi within the room. 

The Location - Located near the heart of Jakarta's business district, even with the jam it takes you about an hour to reach most major locations within the city district. The Lotte Shopping Mall below has almost everything you need including a movie theater, supermarket, eateries, international brands, kids play area and a duty free shop. So not wanting to go far cos of the daunting jam does not restrict you to just your apartment. 

The service - Did not take long to check in,The staffs are well trained, and do a thorough cleaning of your room, from the kitchen to the bathroom. Only thing that need brushing up is the egg/waffle counter guy during breakfast. He seems overwhelmed by the requests and need multiple reminders of orders. Maybe they could assign another guy to help him out or a better way to manage the orders like sticky notes or such. The wait staff are efficient in clearing the plates and getting the coffee though.

The Good - Spacious well-taken-care-of room and good location with Mall below.

The Bad - Egg station guy needs better management skills.
title: Good apartment for a few day's stay.

text:
I rarely would give such a dismal rating but this is the biggest disappointment I experience in a reputable property.

Upon check in I was told something totally different from the booking confirmation. I chose to write to the managers so that they can choose to rectify rather than not telling them and write a bad review which I think is not fair to them. Email reply from them was to acknowledge it is their shortcoming in the reservation system , they will look into this BUT would not honor the facts in the booking confirmation. So the reply was not to give a solution but to force it through my throat to accept their fault

The room I stayed in 1502 is haunted because we keep hearing crystal clear distinctive cutlery sound from the kitchen. We requested a change of room and there was zero follow up despite the promise to call back the night before. When I went down and check the status of the room change the next afternoon, the staff smiled and say, "okay we will change the room for you"

To be fair the security teams and Dian from the front desk are very helpful and understanding. Other than that the service level is negligible. Breakfast unfortunately is also one of the worst I have in my life

I am glad I stayed to find out how bad this is so that my other colleagues worldwide would not have to go thru the same frustration. It is not about the extra dollar we have to spend, it is about the way the management deal with damage control. All they hope is that the guest don't make anymore noise and not to write a bad review

I booked the cab to the airport to be scheduled at 230PM. I appeared 230PM, luggage was all ready and I waited until 245PM, when I walk to the reception, he told me the taxi is here since 2PM and but he is waiting in the carpark. So if I do not walk to the reception, the poor driver and me would wait till 4PM because no one is doing anything.

The property is very new, walking to Lotte Avenue is a breeze for your dining and shopping needs(the 1 star rating is for this) .But with this kind of guest experience, where no one is keen to do damage control - I will certainly not return
title: Total disappointment

owner_response.text:
Dear Eddiensw,

Thank you for sharing your experience on Trip Advisor.  With great regret, I am saddened to hear that your experience was disappointing.  The team puts in a lot of effort into making guests happy but I am sorry to hear that we failed to meet your expectations.
Feedback whether positive or negative is extremely valuable to the management and a negative review makes us re-evaluate our performance so the issues are not repeated.
I must sincerely apologise about the flaw encountered on the brief auto generated confirmation you received.  Although delayed, the error has since been rectified to reflect detailed and accurate reservation data. 
Moving on to the next point, apartment 1502 has been occupied many times over since our opening in October last year.  However on receiving your review, I was very concerned and immediately conducted further investigations on the sounds you brought up.  After a technical evaluation, we came to a conclusion that the annoying sounds were coming from the air conditioning compressor unit and have since solved the problem.  It is indeed unfair that you had to put up with it and I must therefore apologise that we did not act fast enough to address the issue.
The inconsistent taxi service is also sincerely regretted.  It has been addressed with the team and will be repeatedly briefed to ensure staff stay alert of their surroundings.
On a separate note, we appreciate the kind compliments you shared for the security team and Dian at the Front Desk.  They will be very pleased to hear their efforts are heading in the right direction.  Thank you for sharing your constructive feedback since it is only through our valuable guest comments that we can properly improve our standard of products and services.
I sincerely regret you did not enjoy your stay and I hope that I can convince you to change your mind about another visit to our property. Please reach out to me directly at [manjindar.kaur@the-ascott.com] if you would be willing to give us a chance to turn your experience around.

With regards
Manjindar K / Manager

text:
Given the horrendous traffic gridlock of Jakarta, it is not just recommended, but critical that you choose carefully where you stay, to minimize, if not eliminate, the need to be driven.  There are 3 business districts in Jakarta - Sudirman, Kuningan and Thamrin. If you need to be in Kuningan, then the Ascott is ideal, as it is situated within 3 - 5minutes' walking distance to several office towers, as well as being connected to the Lotte Shopping Avenue complex, which also contains a variety of dining and entertainment options, including an amusement arcade, supermarket and a Fitness First gym.

On both occasions on which I stayed, I thoroughly enjoyed the spacious, brand-new apartment-style accommodation, with high ceilings, very comfortable beds, L'Occitane toiletries and good shower pressure and temperature.  The weekday rates are comparable, if not cheaper than other 5 star hotels, although do bear in mind that this is called a "serviced residence" - I take that to mean a serviced apartment with the ambience and facilities of a luxury hotel.  While it may not boast an enormous lobby like say the Grand Hyatt, I enjoyed the privacy and exclusivity of the Ascott, and feeling like an individual, rather than one of thousands.  

The breakfast was OK - as long as you remember that this is a serviced apartment and not a 5-star hotel and don't expect a Mandarin Oriental-style culinary extravaganza, then you won't be disappointed.  All the usual continental items, plus 4 - 5 hot dishes (Western and Asian), it was more than adequate for my needs.  

Adjacent to the restaurant is a lovely outdoor swimming pool, which was usually deserted.  A reasonably well-equipped gym is also available.  Wi-Fi is free throughout the property, which is a bonus.

Highly recommended.
title: Luxury, space and location!

text:
This newest outlet of the Ascott brand in Mega Kuningan is a nice addition to the already thriving hotel ecosystem of Mega Kuningan. Located strategically in the same building as Lotte Mall, Ciputra World 1, the main sales point is location and convenience.
Because of this, I was thouroughly disappointed to learn, that the direct access to Lotte Mall was not finished (and probably won't be before July this year!). The effect of this is that you have to exit the hotel and walk all the way around the mall to enter from the other side. There is no connection through the building yet. Additionally, it is very annoying that there is construction noises coming from everywhere and at every time in the day. There is fine gypsum and concrete dust everywhere, on the floor, walls, etc. If you are sensitive to dust, avoid this hotel for now. If you are sensitive to noise, avoid for now.
The breakfast is not bad, but it is far from good either. You get much better breakfast for similarly priced hotels in the area (Oakwood, Ritz, Marriot). The rooms are ok (yet dusty from construction dust being carried in through AC), but nice view on Mega Kuningan area. The pool area is nice, located on 11th floor with a nice breeze in the evening. Problem here also is they are not fully operating yet, meaning sometimes there is staff around and sometimes there isn't. This is ok for a 3-4 star hotel but not ok for a 5-star-wannabe hotel. Overall, they should lower their prices for the time being in order to make up for construction related inconveniences and lack of properly trained staff. Things being as they are, they are not competetive with other 5 star hotels in the area (Ritz, Oakwood, Marriot). I will stay in one of those next time, much better value at the same price point.
title: No value for money, basically you spend 5star money on staying in a construction site

owner_response.text:
Dear BigD_Ali,
Thank you for posting a review on our Trip Advisor page.  The management at Ascott Kuningan places a great deal of importance on feedback received from our valued guests, whether positive or negative.
Our goal is always to provide the best service possible and any delay is certainly unintentional and regrettable.
I am very sorry to hear we failed to meet your expectations for the most part and that your brief stay with us has caused a negative impression.  I must sincerely apologise for your negative experience here and at the same time share my comments on the inconvenience you had to bear.

We are a very new property having opened our doors since October 2014.  We take pride in offering our guests and residents the very best in services and facilities and we also expect a premium standard in terms of workmanship, thus the completion has caused a further extension on the construction works on site.  Please be rest assured that majority of the works are indeed completed with the exception of the pedestrian link and a small percentage of rectifications in the apartments above.  We are as equally disappointed as yourself on the delay of the pedestrian link to the shopping mall.  The link which requires co-ordination between Ascott and the mall has been delayed due to unexpected reasons and there is never a day we fail to follow up on the progress.  Thank you for bringing this up along with several of our guests.  We have received assurances that the link will be completed soon and before July.

We always appreciate having our guests bring to our attention, as you have done, what has not met with their expectations.  Rest assured appropriate measures are being taken to ensure the cleanliness of the rooms especially since dust is still prevalent as you had pointed out.  Breakfast improvements are also being put in place.  Nevertheless, we regret for the unfortunate experience you had with us. 

Let me reassure you that we always attempt to delight our valued guests during their visit with us and we shall be honoured to welcome you back again. If your travels bring you back to Jakarta again, it would be our pleasure to demonstrate our hospitality once again.

Thank you and my best regards
Manjindar Kaur / Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Arrived at the premise and was immediately greeted and recognized - as they have been expecting my arrival. Check-In was a breeze and they provide all-day coffee and tea facilities at the lobby with a public Macintosh for those who wish to use a full-size terminal to surf the Internet.

As the apartment is spanking new (apparently opened 1 October) and only several floors were "opened" during this period so the entire building is very exclusive and private. Facilities include gymnasium, swimming pool on the 11th Floor, basket ball / tennis courts, meeting rooms, a huge Residents' Lounge, etc. Breakfast is served on the 11th Floor next to the pool. Food and variety is acceptable with egg station, pastry, local food, fruits, etc. As the occupancy is still relatively low at this period, breakfast was very private and exclusive and the staff makes full effort to attend, serve and meet our requests.

The apartment is fully equipped with utensils, cooking ware, refrigerator, oven, etc. and everything imaginable in a complete standard kitchen. The apartment is spacious with a kitchen, dining area and living area - with a flat-screen TV with DVD player, home theater speakers, etc. Yes, it's free Wi-Fi in all the rooms with very good speed.

The bedrooms are comfortable in size and comes complete with a 2nd flat screen TV. Bathrooms have tubs and they use quality L'Occitane bath products. The bathroom comes complete with a washer / dryer which makes the trip more interesting as we were able to do our laundry almost every night.

Being newly opened (with only 3 floors occupied - the building being 31 Floors), the entire setting / experience is very different. Everything is spanking new, neat, exclusive, the staff are more attentive, etc. and its definitely worth a stay at this moment.

Location-wise, it is situated at Ciputra World 1 and there are both high-end and mid-tier shopping centers all within walking distance. A trip to Grand Indonesia / Plaza Indonesia (Thamrin) takes about 10-15 minutes and costs about 24,000 Rupiah (moderate traffic). A trip to Mangga Dua area took us 40 minutes and costs about 65,000 Rupiah. Our return trip to Airport costs us 140,000 Rupiah and took us 45 minutes in moderate traffic condition.

I certainly enjoyed my stay at the Ascott Kuningan and would rate the overall hotel / apartment experience being 9.5 out of 10. For those who wish to consider spacious, fully equipped apartment stay in a luxurious and private setting, the newly opened Ascott Kuningan may just be right for you.
title: Excellent Service & Apartments

text:
We chose this hotel for its location as the roads leading to it are not that jammed. The 2 bedroom unit was spacious with good layout. There were however a few issues:
- we couldn’t find a hairdryer and requested for 2 since this is a 2 bedder. They were reluctant and explained only 1 hairdryer was allocated per unit. Anyway, the hairdryer was somewhat faulty but we were too tired to request a replacement. This wasn’t a good start to our stay!
- the wardrobe doors in the master bedroom were hard to open. It eventually became stuck and I had to request for repair.
- the mirrors are all tinted and with dim lighting, the rooms were too dark. 
I read about the poor breakfast but was pleasantly surprised. It’s not bad and they changed the selection everyday over a 4 day stay. 
The entrance is tucked away so we like that the road in front was not bustling and security is good. In conclusion, location is the main draw but I would point out the flaws.

text:
Its facilities are absolutely fantastic and staff are so lovely and courteous, which set them ready to be truly 5 stars in par with other hotels beyond Indonesia. However, there are some serious short comings that need to be addressed.

1) breakfast is monotonous and cold. Some time even drip coffee has been switched off. 

2) Blasting out music very loud in breakfast areas ad terrace is a terrible idea. Please turn it down. Many clients are there for business or leisure and we enjoy tranquility we get in 5 star hotels, away from the noise of the city. I say again. Loud music is not welcome. 

3) Shame about reliability and the level of house keeping service. Staff is very nice, but can be cheeky in skipping their duties where possible whether it is not changing towels when they should be, leaving the heavy water tank on the floor without installing, or even didn't turn up for cleaning as it was time to go home . 

4)The public toilet on the 11th floor can be filthy with water everywhere in cubicles and remain uncleaned. I stop using there even though it is convenient when you are in the lounge area. 

The hotel respond very well to feedback and do their best to rectify issues raised immediately. However, my expectation is that I don't have to remind hotel what they are supposed to do as a 5 star hotel. Since breakfast and cleanness have been repeatedly mentioned here, it's high time to rectify these issues.
title: Not quite 5 star but with good potential

text:
While I have stayed at many places in Jakarta, this was the first at this location.  Our family spent two nights here an were very pleased by the place.  We had a three bedroom apartment which felt huge compared to regular hotel rooms.  All the rooms were large with great views of the city.  The balcony is nice for some fresh air, but I would be cautious with smaller children as they may be able to climb up on the rail.

The views from the master bed and bath were exceptional and I have not had a room with anything similar before.

The pool and play area are large and nicely maintained.  Being attached to the mall is nice if you want to eat out, go shopping, or buy groceries.  You don't really need to leave the complex if you don't want to.

One the negative side, the connection to the mall has stairs which is a small issue for strollers or people with mobility issues.  Also the kitchen is not really stocked with some basic cleaning supplies.
title: Exceeded Expectations

text:
First of all, the phone line here is very poor. You can try calling yourself and no one will pick up your phone call. +622130060288
The only way to contact them is by email. They reply fast by email. I booked a two bed executive room and got upgraded to two bed premier room for being a Platinum member. I requested for late check out and they said i can check out at 2. However we decided to extend for one more night. I booked the same category room. When i extend my room, the front office told me to book the correct room category next time. I told her the manager said i can book executive and get free upgrade for being platinum. She doesnt even know the program! When i requested for late check out. She said no. If you are an elite member of ASR its better of to book Ascott near Grand Indonesia where they know the program benefits. First day is great, second day is not
title: ASR Benefit not met

text:
Hot water was not working, i was told to open the water for 15 mins to trigger the heat to get the maximum heat, i said to the guest reception that i felt uncomfortable to waste such amount of water, she said that is what the guidance said. I opened the tap for 10 mins but no sign of heating water, the guest reception then called technician to check. The technician came with ladder and check the water heater above the kitchen area, he said thay the thersmostat was turned off and he just turned on again, and ask me to open the water for 15 minutes (again??) so i did. Because i wanted to use the bath tub, I opened the tap and let the water flowing wasted, and waited again for 15 minutes. After 10 mins there was sign of heating water but it was not that hot. 15 mins passing, the heat was still around the same. I could get sick if i soak my body in that temperature at that hour (8PM) I turned off the tap because i had wasted so much water for nothing. So dissapppointing. But then 15 mins later my friend showered and he said the water is hot. So apparently we just need to wait, and  no need to waste so much water to get it heated. Two staff in this hotel gave the same solution that were not wise and not environmental friendly! 

The morning we get the breakfast box delivered to our room. We ordered the same. Sausage Platter. But mine came without sausage in it. A sausage Platter without Sausage... So dissapointing. Great Job, Ascott Kuningan. This will be my first and last time staying.
title: So disappointing for so called 5 stars service

text:
This my my first time stay at Ascott Kuningan for staycation. We choose Ascott Kuningan considering we have good experiences with Ascott  Group (Ascott Orchard). Hotel located at Business District and Commercial areas.
Hotel has implemented Health Protocol for Covid 19. All guests have to do body check before entering the hotel. Check in desk with acrylic partition. Hand sanitizer provided in entrace gate, front desk & lift. Check in easy & fast. Only need few minutes to get our room but we have to wait for a moment due to the room must be sprayed disinfectant. Thanks to Mr. Martin front office on duty. We choose Executive 2 Bed Room to compare with our previous stayed in Ascott Orchard. Room size is very big consists of dinning table (6 seater), living room (sofa & tv), master room (double bed, mirror tv, work desk, bathroom shower & bathtube), 2nd room (2 single bed & tv), shower bathroom and modern pantry (microwave, refrigerator, electric stove, magic jar, coffee maker). Hotel has direct access to Shopping Mall also same likes Ascott Orchard. 
The room located at high floor (29th). The view is very amazing. 
Restaurant at 11th same floor with pool. The foods very good taste especially for Tenderloin Steak & Lobster. Need 30 minutes to get our foods since they also serve room service. Thanks to Mr Danny, he is very polite and helpfull. 
Overall we are happy with property. All clean and in the good maintain. 
Check out also very easy and fast. Thanks to Ms. Siti, she also very supportive.
title: Good Hotel in the Good Location

owner_response.text:
Dear Scbintang,

Thank you very much for your recent stay at Ascott Kuningan Jakarta and sharing your  feedback .

Noticing from your feedback regarding your inconvenience during your stay, please allow me to assure you that we are inline with the government regulation regarding The Large Scale of Social Distancing (PSBB)  from the entrance that our security guard wearing mask, safety glasses and hand glove doing temperature check. We install the portable wash basin at the lobby entrance as well and placing hand sanitizer in every area including our elevators, in addition we closed some areas such as children playground and play room, meeting room. and screening the new arrival by having the health declaration form prior check in.

Our restaurant closed for Buffet Breakfast and No Dine In service, restaurant team will drop the breakfast box in accordance to the guest preferred time and we will ensure the hygiene and sanitation of meals to meet with our standard. Restaurant team equipped their staff who deliver the food with hand gloves, mask and hair net to ensure personal and food hygiene.

Our Housekeeping team are wearing mask and Hand glove while they are on duty, we do regular disinfecting all areas including guest unit. the gym is prohibited more than 4 person and our team do cleaning all the equipment all the time using disinfectant and antiseptic  (we put the hand sanitizer, wet wipes and antiseptic spray that can be use by the guest) as well as swimming pool. 

We earnestly hope that this information are able to give you more confidence to stay with us in the future as the safety and comfort of our guest are remaining top priority

Thank you and Regards,


A. Haris Sumarwan
Residence Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I was very impressed with the Ascott Kuningan. I spent four nights here at the end of a two month Indonesia/Australia trip. 

They upgraded me to a larger apartment, which was furnished well enough to make it feel like home. Acres of space, a well appointed bathroom and kitchen, and an extremely comfortable bed. Killer touch was the bedroom’s TV, hidden in a 3 metre long wall mirror.

Outside of the room, the staff were all very friendly and well organised. 

The gym was a little small, but fine for a reasonable workout. It would be much vetted if the weights area was bigger and the fitness studio smaller.

Breakfast was good without being outstanding. A few more healthy options and less processed meats/
cheese and cakes would go down well.

The pool area was excellent.

The only real criticism was the WiFi - not that great, and constantly logging off.
title: Great services accommodation

text:
Stayed in 2 bedroom premier in the corner area. This place has quite spacious room with complete set up for cooking, including microwave and stove which complement itself since this hotel is linked to the lotte shopping avenue mall with groceries stores in basement area. The staff is polite and full of smile, start from security, front office, and housekeeping. 

The room light is not too bright which really help to create some elegant ambience to stay. The bad thing for this place is when you need to get up from their comfy bed with nice view of garden and pool, add with one cup of tea and nice warm bath, its hard to even leave this place and return to your home.

Level 11 is the place where I really like to go often, with large lounge area, super big TV, internet connection, nice poolside area and basketball area (they even allow us to borrow the basketball for free and the area also free to use).

Overall really recommend this place, oh and it is near ITC kuningan if you would like to buy souvenir or T shirt.

SECURITY!!!!!!After about 20 minutes after checking they allowed a stranger to have the same key card as me and they entered my apartment !!!!!

. Luckily I was not naked etc as I had some emails to catch up on. 

They manger came to apologise but it was almost forced from me to get them to offer a gesture of good will. 

I was offered a free 60 minute massage and that was it.

text:
I have stayed for 2 nights in Ascott Kuningan with my family.
It's such a great experience.
I love the cleanliness and its efficient rooms. 
I adore the kitchen since I love to cook.
To complete the great experience, we have a direct access to the mall. Even after check-out, the staff still offered the direct access to the mall, so we can put our luggage in the concierge and walk freely to shop again before our departure.
The night before staying in Ascott, our daughter had a stomachache, but we didn't worry since we knew the mall next to Ascott also has medical clinic.
Two little things that quite annoying were long time waiting for the elevator and no hot/cold water label in the bathroom.
But those were understandable.
Overall, we enjoy our stay, we enjoy cooking there and also the great scenery from our room.
Don't forget to ask for higher level room to enjoy the best view
title: Great Escape for the Weekend

When my wife request near staycation accomodation on lebaran holiday, we choosed ascott kuningan for 2 night. The location were superb, next to lotte shopping avenue and near sudirman and rasuna said street.

First impression not so pleased, we arrived at 1 pm for admin process and we informed that check in time was 2 pm, so we looked for lunch. But when we arrived at 3.30 pm, they said our room not ready yet, and we got the room at 4pm. i think there was previous guest that extend room time, but they didn’t aware of next guest arrival.

And unfortunately when we already unpacked our goods from suitcase, our room air con was having problem, and the technician would need long time to fix and they offer to moved us to other room. So we must packed our things again. 

Next day, we had breakfest, the menu were dissapointing. its to small for 5star accomodation, even for 3 star hotel! There are more issue, the restaurant AC were very hot, No waiter help us to find seat, since the restaurat were packed. the fried rice so difficult to chew and swallow. and the pastry croissant... were nightmare! they dont have same size and taste awful. So it was bad experience eating on this hotel.

For me this hotel have good location, but has lot of homework to do... its first time and last time for me for sure.
title: Not so impressing

text:
If you're looking for a staycation, this is a perfect option for you. The apartment is full-furnished, with washing machine (detergent provided), fully equipped kitchen (which is a major plus point for me), and when I say fully equipped, I mean it. They got oven, dishwasher, and even sponge & soap if you feel like washing by yourself. They got toaster, rice cooker, water kettle (obviously), a full set of victorinox utensils and other cooking equipments.

The living room is equipped with TV, DVD player, awesome bluetooth speaker with subwoofer. The AC works just fine. They also provide ironing kit, laundry basket and hanger.

The swimming pool is big and relaxing. And got enough sunlight in the morning.The breakfast is delicious as well.

Not just about the room, but the service is excellent as well. I requested for a late check-out on the next day, and staff informed they can't guarantee and I'll have to call back tomorrow morning. But before I even call them, they already call me and told me I can do let check-out. Thanks Oliv! (if I remember correctly lol).

I would very much love to stay again (if Traveloka or other OTA gave off huge discount, ofc, otherwise can't afford it haha)
title: Best. Staycation. Ever.

text:
Hotel located in Kuningan, perfect location for us. Well connected to Ciputra world mall where plenty foods and some shopping. It is across the street from Kuningan city mall where we wanted to apply for visa. It is about 5-10 minutes drive (can catch grab) to Kuningan city mall as it is now become visa center for Canadian, Australian, NZ, UK, some schegen. Hotel is easy to find.

Check in was fast and service is very friendly. Lobby is small and nice. We stayed in 2 bedrooms apartment. It was very spacious. Nicely decorated. Big living room, great city view, 4 seater sofa (2+1+1) and LCD TV. Kitchen was clean and good size, we didnt cook but they have all the appliances (water dispenser, refrigerator, microwave, stove, oven, kettle) , cooking wear (pots pan, knives etc) plates bowls spoons etc. they have small storage room (big cupboard), surprisingly they even have extra small room for maid at the back (but no bed), All aircond are cold. (In bedrooms and livingroom) so made our stay very comfortable. 

Both bedrooms decent size with wardrobes. Great comfortable beds,  linen, blankets, pillows, all are clean. Good blackout curtain. Not noisy. We had a good sleep.

Other things that we love is this 2 bedrooms have 2 bathroom. (One with bath and shower located in master room) and the other one is outside with shower. Both bathroom are clean. Good hotel amenities, good shower pressure. 

We had a couple tiny problem one is the water drainage in master bedroom. But they fixed it while we were shopping another problems, the other is remote control batteries for both TV remotes (living room and second bedroom) We did not let them know because we just used the remote from master bedroom. 

The only thing that need to improve is the breakfast. They have a limited selection, and most of them didnt taste good. However the breakfast place located next to pool area with city view. So we can always choose to have a relaxing morning at the outdoor.

As I have mentioned that hotel is connection with Ciputra world mall, there are many selection of food and shops to choose, just be aware that the connection is closed at 10pm. 

So, with great customer service, clean big rooms, comfortable beds, great shower, great location, fast check in and out. we will surely come back and stay 

Thanks for good hospitality.
title: Great apartment hotel next to mall, across from visa center

text:
Celebrating my wife bday, we stay at one bedroom executive. Room is nice and spacious with full equipped kitchenware, stove and microwave, the bed is quote soft. Bathroom with shower and bathtub. Great location, connect to mall, which can fulfill your appetite and shopping. 
Hotel has good facilities for sport, there are pools (depth 1.2M) with kids pool (also has kids playground and club),basketball and tennis court, gym and aerobic room.
Breakfast is underline and bold, very limited choice for 5-star hotels, and sometime food was empty for a while, need replenish more often. Quality of food should be prioritize to improve soon.
In the future, think about to book the room without breakfast, since you can cook or go to nearby cafe or restaurant.
title: great location and amenities with low quality of F&B

text:
Staying here for two nights in executive one bedroom type and everything are perfect! 

Located right behind Ciputra World Kuningan, this apartment style hotel is in the heart of Jakarta. It’s perfect for family and business, esp if you need to stay long.

Check in was fast. The staffs are friendly. The room is perfect! With kitchen, dining & living room area, it is spacious enough and clean. Love the interior design too! 

As an apartment type hotel, they provide complete cooking utensils and machines such as : refrigerator, galon dispenser, stove, microwave, rice cooker, toaster, and even dishwasher machine. Ironing board and washing machine also available. 

Facilities also great! They have indoor kids club, outdoor playground, swimming pool, basketball & tennis field. We didn’t try the pool, but my daughter love the playground. 

They also have direct access to Lotte Shopping Avenue so it’s very convenient if you want to find something to eat or just shopping.

We really enjoy our stay here and definitely will be back :)
title: Perfect!

text:
Perfectly nice apartment, nice bath, friendly staff with a decent bar and pool. The gym needed a fan!

The issue with the room was two fold, firstly the washer-dryer refused to dry... I put my clothes in there for 8 hours straight and they just got hot whilst remaining wet so I had to take a suitcase of wet clothes home.

Secondly the aircon design was mad! The condenser was in the same space as the washer-dryer behind a cupboard door on a ledge that was open but the unit was right behind the cupboard door with the exhaust pointing BACK INTO THE ROOM. So the aircon was busy cooling down the room and the condenser was just blowing it straight back against the cupboard door...We all know that physics means that will make the room hotter. Madness! Oh well.

text:
➖ We stayed for one night at a two bedroom apartment ! The apartment is spacious, clean and has all the basic amenities! However , it didn’t look like a 5* Hotel at all to me and I have been to many places worldwide ! The reception is small, check-in and out were fast , there was NO one to take us to the apartment and orient us around the different amenities and how to use them in order to avoid problems! So we took time to find things and know how to operate them, especially since we were very tired and just arrived from a long tiring flight!
We then discovered that the A/C was not working and we had to call the reception , who send us the technician , who also brought another technician as he discovered that the issue was big and they took almost 2 hours if not more to fix it , coming and going in and out the apartment, which was very disturbing and annoying ! Then they asked us to move to another room since fixing the AC will take longer time which we totally refused as we were already dead tired and just wanted to get some rest!! 
The hotel need to check the rooms prior to guests occupying them and make sure everything is going smooth especially for the high price we payed for the property which supposed to be a 5* Hotel!! That was honestly a very very annoying experience! 
Also the breakfast was very basic and the restaurant was very small with limited choices , again not suitable for a 5* Hotel !! 
I don’t think I would come again to this or other Ascott properties as it was a very uncomfortable experience for me! 
I don’t recommend it as you don’t get what you pay for ! There are better choices much cheaper and of good quality!

➕ The location is good! The staff are kind! Clean apartment , full amenities , the view from the room is nice.
title: ‘Doesn’t look like a 5* Hotel’

text:
Decided to have a staycation here. Booked the one bedroom unit. The unit itself is very big. The staff is very friendly and very attentive.

This hotel/serviced apartment located above a shopping mall, it has direct entry to the mall through H&M. Location wise, it's located in a busy area of Jakarta that can very jammed in certain time of days. Though located in a busy area, this hotel is very quiet, barely hear the sounds of the traffic.

By the time I open the door to the unit, I was in awe by the size. It's very spacious. All this space continue to the bed room also to the bathroom. Bed is fluffy, felt like sleeping on the cloud. The bathroom has separated shower and also bath tub. Amenities are using L'Occitane. Unit is equipped with fully worked kitchen, including all utensils, chinaware also silverware.

Pool area is not too big, but it's more than enough to cater the needs of the guests. When I was there, lots of family with kids are filling up the space. It has basketball and tennis court on the 10th floor. 

Breakfast is just OK. They have lots of varieties, but taste wise is not that excellent.
title: A Good Alternative for Staycation

text:
I stayed with my wife and two children aged 8 y.o and 20 months old baby in Ascott Kuningan, Jakarta, for two nights during the 2018 Eid Al Fitr long weekend. We booked one bedroom service apartment.

The room is equipped with two televisions, dvd player with micro hi-fi audio, dishwasher machine, electric stove, microwave, refrigerator, front loader washing machine, bathtub, and all necessary toilet amenities. All of them worked well and really helped us preparing special need baby food for my youngest.

The hotel facilities are decent and well maintained, it has decent size swimming pool, a gymnasium, basketball and tennis court, outdoor children playing area, free parking, private access to the adjacent shopping mall (Ciputra Lotte Avenue).

The downsize are the bed size and breakfast, however these do not create any discomfort for us during our stay in Ascott. The bed cannot accommodate young family like mine, thus we requested an extra bed with additional surcharge but still it is value for money compared if we booked a two bedrooms service apartment.

Breakfast is all you can eat but the choices are limited, do not set your expectation like other five star hotel breakfast nearby (e.g. Ritz Carlton, JW Marriot, Westin, etc). As I said even though it was limited, there are plenty other restaurants you can had breakfast within walking distance (local and international cuisine) or we can cook in the room or otherwise you can go to the shopping mall or you can opt for food delivery from any restaurant that provide delivery services.

Will I stay again? The answer is YES, the hotel is situated in strategic area and it feel like home but in smaller size. For my next trip I will make the same booking but without breakfast option.
title: Good hotel for young professional and young family

text:
The Ascott Kuningan is a very fine hotel that offers appartments for short and long term stays. 

The location of the hotel is attractive in the embassy area of Jakarta and virtually next door to a very large modern shopping mall that houses a large selection of international quality stores as well as several restaurants and a "street food" area with more than 20 stands. The mall can be accessed from inside the hotel without going outside.

The rooms ("appartments") are large with separate living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom and hallway. The rooms have all the quality ammenities (and more) that you would require.

Breakfast is fine with a good selection of local and international foods. However, the restaurant should be avoided for dinner. I had two separate bad experiences with the restaurant so personally I will not use it again. However, this is not really a problem as the mall next door offers a wide range of possibilities for eating.

Apart for the restaurant the Ascott Kuningan is a very fine hotel that is highly recommended.
title: Excellent Hotel For Short And Long Term Stays in Jakarta

text:
I stayed at the Ascotts Kuningan in March 2018 for a work trip.

This is my feedback:

Plus:
- Courteous front desk service.
- I got an upgrade, which is always a pleasant surprise.
- Ascotts has always been known for the space of their residence.
The design is okay.

Areas of improvement:
- Cleanliness – I noticed there were stains on the sofa and carpet. It’s not the most pleasing sight. 
- No late night in-room dining. When I checked in around 11pm, I was told that the in-room dining had already closed by 10:30pm. If possible, this could be extended to 1-2am in view of the possible late arrival of guests. That said, the front desk did offer to order food delivery for me but I declined. 
- One of the cupboard doors in the room is damaged. The hinge came off and it does not a permit the cupboard to close quietly, properly or fully.

Big design flaw:
This is something that I strongly do not agree with the design of bedroom. The television is designed as part of a mirror in the bedroom probably to look sleek. However, this mirror faces the bed. Whether one is superstitious or not, it is not appropriate for the mirror to be placed at the foot of the bed. For this reason, I am not inclined to give the 5-stars I would give to Ascotts Kuningan. 

For this same reason, I would not be inclined to stay at the Ascott Kuningan again unless the mirror design is changed.
title: A generally good place to be at but with a big design flaw.

owner_response.text:
Dear KevinKSY,
Thank you for sharing your review on your recent stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and have taken note on some matters you have highlighted for our immediate improvements. In addition to your concern about the TV inside the mirror, please do ask for our 02 and 12 series of our 1-bedroom units for your future bookings. These units do not have the mirror to cover the TV as the others. 
We hope that you will still consider to come back and visit us again and give us the opportunity to show you the improvements we have made. We thank you for having chosen to stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again.

Best regards,
Evelyne Kwee

text: Short stay with family and overall satisfied with the apartment and service. Firstly I really appreciate that staff considered my request for the corner room on the highest possible floor. Staff was in general attentive, helpful and served refreshment while we waited for check in. Two bedroom apartment with kitchen was spacious, comfortable, fitted with all appliances and spotlessly clean. However the decor of the room and particularly corridor was too dark, simplistic and lacked of any "luxurious features".  Lobby is tiny and common areas, dinning/drinking options are very limited (direct access to Ciputra Mall One on 2nd fl. where dozens of restaurants and food court somehow compensates for it). Breakfast buffet was satisfactory (nothing special thought) and it can be taken by large pool. Ascott is located in business district of Megakuningan (part of Golden Triangle area). While it is strategic area with offices and malls around it is not exactly the Central Jakarta (closer to South Jakarta) and during rash hours, it may take up to an hour to Gambir Train station and more to the Old Town or to the Airport Overall I enjoyed the stay and would come back.
title: Great stay, helpful staff, spotlessly clean modern apartment, limited facilities

text:
Have always been a fan of Ascott and decided  to give it a go during our recent visit. 

First and foremost, we arrived at Ascott rather early around 8am due to us taking an overnight flight - the management gave us access to the residence lounge whilst the room were prepared for us and we were able to checkin later that morning. It’s something that I really appreciate as a regular traveller when management goes out of their way to accommodate guest’s request. The property being fairly new has all the bells and whistles - room are well furnished and makes for a cozy stay stay. 

Biggest attraction for us is it’s convenient location next to the shopping mall which pretty much has everything you need on a visit to Jakarta. We did our fair share of dining and shopping here - super convenient for those who hate Jakarta traffic :-)

Service is too notch - I appreciated the little things that the staff did for us whilst we were there. Keep up the good work Ascott and thank you to all the wonderful staff that made our stay wonderful!
title: Home away from home ...

text:
I enjoyed my stay in a deluxe one-bedroom at the Ascott Kuningan. The space is comfortable for two and I felt at home immediately. The rest of the facilities in the property are wonderful too. They are mainly located on the 11th floor where the cafe and gym overlook the swimming pool. On the other side is a lovely common room and a playroom for children.

The fact that the property is above a shopping mall makes things convenient too. Journey time to and from the airport is subjective because of traffic conditions in the city. 

Otherwise, this is a property I am happy to go back to the next time I am in Jakarta.
title: I will be back!
