text:
We were looking for serviced apartment for 3 night stay and luckily saw this in trip advisor and this one also connecting to mall, lotte shopping avenue for the exact. 

It’s located in a very strategic situation. Next to raffles and somerset so you don’t need to worry about your safety. This one is top notch! 

We booked 2 bedrooms apartment. What we got was 1 main bedroom with super comfy bedroom *esp the bed* and we have bathroom inside. The other was smaller bedroom with 2 single bed but not as comfy as the main bedroom. They also provide another bathroom outside the bedroom. They provide pantry with plates, and everything you need, also laundry room which i realized at the end of the night which was actually so wide. 

Nice and comfy living room and dining room. The breaktast was just okay, it wasn’t blow me away but they’re delicious enough. The staff were all very friendly esp the housekeeping staff they were so helpful. My main concern was only the staff in the reception area. There was a girl whom i forgot the name but i remember the look, she was the one with her hair straight not the one with ponytail. she was so jutek and judes in indonesia. Not to me but to the other guest. The guest was from abroad and had problem in communications, his english not that good and the girl seemed so upset and answer him so unpolitely and after the guest was gone, she talked bad about the guest to a friend next to her in bahasa. I saw it and it was so annoying. Please have some respect. 

But besides, ascott kuningan is always a good idea to stay. Esp for family with kids and everything.
title: Pleasant stay!

text:
We stayed for one night on staycation and in overall, it was a good experience. The one bedroom unit was very well appointed with sizeable kitchen and the condotel is connected to Lotte Avenue Shopping Mall. It is also close to Raffles Hotel and Mega Kuningan office complex. 

Pros:
- Very clean room
- Comfortable bed, linen and pillows
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Bathroom has bathtub and standing shower
- Full high glass windows in the bedroom & living room to have a city view
- Good breakfast spread
- Attentive staff
- Location is in the city's business triangle area (Thamrin, Kuningan, Sudirman) so it is good for business trip as well. 
- Nice pool, although could be full with kids in the morning to noon.

Cons:
- Breakfast was good, but at that time, it was crowded and some guests had to wait for a while to get the table. The restaurant itself is not too big. 
- Check-in was slow, only two staff at the front desk. 
- Traffic in front of condotel is OK during weekend, but usually bad during peak hours on weekdays. 

Verdict:
- Recommended for family staycation and/or business trip
title: Good size unit, very clean and good location

Dear Gan A

We thank you for choosing to stay with us at Ascott Kuningan Jakarta.

We are very concerned to note of your dissatisfaction pertaining to the quality of our buffet breakfast served.  For this, I sincerely do apologize and have shared your feedback with our restaurant operator. text:
Other reviewers have summarised the Ascott well. The rooms are indeed large, and generally comfortable. Good location.

The breakfast is a real problem, as others commented. I know it's a serviced apartment and not a regular hotel, but it's better to offer no breakfast than such a poor one, as it detracts from the brand. Bread stale, eggs very poorly cooked, and hardly any choice at all. Do it well, or don't bother. 

Overall I think I'll try another hotel next time I'm in Jakarta.
title: Mixture of pros and cons. Overall OK

owner_response.text:
Dear dulu0z,
Thank you for posting your feedback on Trip Advisor. We value guest comments whether positive or negative and glad to hear you enjoyed your stay despite the negative breakfast experience.
It is disappointing to receive negative reviews but we use these to better ourselves. The quality you experienced is also not acceptable in our standards and we have shared these comments with our breakfast vendor to work on improvements. Yes, we are indeed a serviced residence but are unable to remove breakfast from our rates as majority of our guests prefer to have the inclusion of daily breakfast with rates. 
However, we shall also look into offering rates excluding breakfast as we continue to make improvements on our offering which is a continental spread that also includes hot dishes and an egg station.
I am sorry for your disappointment. The inconvenience caused to you is sincerely regretted and we will work towards making sure that the quality improves. On the other hand, we appreciate the positive comments too. 
In the meantime, I would also like to interest you to register as an Ascott online member. As a member of Ascott Online Advantage, you enjoy exclusive year-long discounts, seasonal promotions and special benefits at any of our properties (Ascott, Somerset and Citadines). Registration is easy and free. Log on to the Ascott website and sign up now.
Thank you for your business, and we hope to have another opportunity to serve you better in the future.

Regards
Manjindar

text: My wife and I stayed at Ascott for 1 year and moved out when we had the opportunity to live in another part of Jakarta.  The thing that makes Ascott different to all the other places is the staff and the management.  They listen.  Manjindar and Eve get things done.  It was a pleasure to live at Ascott.  Our Housekeeper whos name was Sila was excellent at her job.  Personal touches from this establishment make a real difference.  They remember birthdays, gifts on leaving and days out to places of interest in Jakarta, along with free cooking courses.  Albert is a star and a good chef.  He is on the front desk and has in depth knowledge of Jakarta.  I was not an easy guest and complained about lots of things.  My complaints were addressed and things rectified - quickly, usually within hours or at least within1 day.  Ascott take Health and Safety seriously with regular fire drills.  The pool is situated in the best place.  The sun never goes behind a building.  The sun is on you as long as you need, never shadowed.  I could say many many more good things about Ascott...but ....go and see it yourself...you will love it.

text:
The hotel is connected to Lotte mall in Kuningan. I was not very impressed mostly due to small problems that kept coming up. I stayed for 8 nights:

Pros:
1. Connected to Lotte mall with walkway from level 2 (closed to May 31 tho)
2. Clean hotel
3. Rooms quiet on the Raffles hotel side only 
4. Nice lounge on floor 11 across from the breakfast area
5. Decent gym and nice outdoor pool 
6. Good security and Silver bird or blue bird taxi out front
7. Stable WIFI all over hotel

Cons:
1. Breakfast not very extensive. Pretty limited and just not very good. Service wise its fine no issues there. 
2. Seem to only have two working elevators vs 3 or 4 they have. 
3. Lots of families stay here and kids. I mean a lot of kids and crying babies. Breakfast was not peaceful ever. Take your food go across the hall and eat there. 
4. If you face the backside of the hotel (non raffles side) to a big open area. You will be woken up to the Muslim call to Prayer at 3-4am then again 4 more times. They did not triple pane the windows. They went cheap and there are 3 mosques in that open area. They start up around 3-4am then they each go for 30-45 minutes. If you are a light sleeper forget it. Ask for a room facing the pool side/ Raffles hotel. 
5. I had many issues in my room. Seems like the quality is not there. Toilets that kept not working (they came up 6 different times to fix) My black out curtains were 5 feet too short. A/C not really cooling. 
6. Just a overall feeling of "meh" The employees were nice but training seems lacking. Again twice called to have my room cleaned after 4pm and nobody ever came. 
7. No room service, you can't even get coffee nothing. Oakwood you can get food. 

The major selling point to this hotel/long term is connected to Lotte Avenue mall. Its a great mall with a ranch market on the bottom floor. Fitness First up on the 3rd level if you want a extensive gym and yes you can get a weeks pass. Lots of good shopping and a few good coffee places to hang out it. 

I may stay here again if the price was right. However I would not go out of my way to book again. Oakwood is more money but you get what you pay for.
title: Mixed review

owner_response.text:
Dear moobaby214,
Thank you for your honest feedback.  At Ascott, we welcome all kinds of guests – families, leisure travelers and particularly business travelers which has been our biggest segment since we opened a year ago.
I would like to personally apologize for the series of unfortunate incidences that you experienced in your room during your stay with us. It is disappointing to receive negative reviews but the points raised would help to better ourselves.  We are investigating the delay in getting the bathroom and air conditioning rectified along with the housekeeping service.  It would have been frustrating to have to bear with such inconvenience.  We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests, but unfortunately, sometimes we do fail.  I will look into each issue that you have brought up, in an attempt to correct and improve for future guests.
Sometimes we do have periods during school holidays or national holidays when we have more families with children.  However, the staff at the breakfast room should have managed the noise level appropriately.  Thank you for bringing this to my attention so I can look into improving the experience at the breakfast lounge.
The link to the shopping mall at level 2 is indeed closed temporarily for safety reasons to facilitate fit-out works for a new store directly outside the link.  Due to the closure, announcement signages were installed outside the pedestrian link and in the lobby to re-direct guests to an alternative pedestrian walkway at Basement 1 so guests do not have to walk outside in the rain or heat.  Thus the link is still available but from Basement 1 temporarily.
Thank you again for sharing a detailed account of your stay.  The points raised will assist us to re-evaluate our services offered.  The inconvenience caused to you is sincerely regretted and we will work towards making sure that this does not happen again.  On the other hand, we appreciate the positive comments too.  Thank you for your business, and we hope to have another opportunity to serve you better in the future.

Warm regards
Manjindar / Residence Manager

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Against my better judgement, I gave this place another try after they had disappointed earlier this year. The price was ok (138 USD) and the better places (Ritz, Oakwood) were above 160 USD. Oh how I wish I had paid the couple dollars more...
Basically, since my last visit, things took a turn for the worse. The rooms are still dusty from construction (how long does it take to finish this?!), the service staff is clueless and their repetitive excuses ("I am so sorry Sir") fail to convince that anything will be done to address the issues. AC is not working in any of the public areas nor the lifts. Construction noise from everywhere. The breakfast is ridiculous for the category this hotel aspires to. Minimal selection, poor taste, literally no service here either (no surprise). No service also in the pool area. At 6pm, all pillows were snatched, how to enjoy the sunset? Access to Lotte Mall finally finished, yet also very poor service here, the guy won't even help opening the door although I had my hands full with shopping bags. Unbelievable experience. My personal highlight was the response of the manager, Mrs Mahindar, yes, you guessed it: "I am so very sorry Sir." I wish they were less sorry and more into actually fixing the things and training the staff, giving proper SOPs, finishing construction, etc.
I wonder if Ascott HQ in Singapore knows what's going on here...
Speaking in terms of value for money, 80 USD would be ok for this experience. If you want to spend more than 100 USD, go to Ritz, Oakwood or Marriott.
title: Worst Management Ever!

text: Отель шикарно расположен - здание соединено с неплохим и достаточно крупным торговым центром - это его бесспорный плюс. По сервису стандартно для Аскотта - медленно и ненавязчиво. Завтраки не самые обширные. Бассейн больше похож на большую ванну. Но зато есть детская площадка на улице и детская комната внутри. В номерах странная планировка, но большие и удобные кровати, хорошооснащенная кухня. Для деловых поездок и поездок с детьми очень удачный вариант. Приедем еще
title: Самое удачное - расположение

owner_response.text:
Dear Lulenchek,
Thank you for sharing feedback on your stay at Ascott Kuningan.  We appreciate the kind comments and certainly look forward to welcome you again in the near future.

Warm Regards
Manjindar / Residence Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Отель, конечно, до уровня Ascott в других странах не тянет совсем, но для Джакарты в целом неплохо. Из главных плюсов : расположение + connection напрямую с молом Ciputra(Lotte), много комнат и площадок для детей, нормальная мебель и сантехника в комнате. Из недостатков: скудный завтрак, медленное и невсегда адекватное обслуживание, неудобная планировка комнат. Учитывая уровень и состояние многих других отелей Джакарты, то данный вариант считаю очень даже.
title: Для Джакарты неплохо

owner_response.text:
Dear Trip Advisor member,
Thank you for sharing a review on your stay at Ascott Kuningan.  Your kind comments are appreciated.
The point raised on breakfast has been shared with the vendor and we are constantly working closely with them on improvements so we can please the many different nationalities staying with us.
We place a great deal of importance on feedback, whether positive or negative and any delay in service is certainly unintentional.
Thank you for bringing your experience to our attention.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to demonstrate our hospitality.

Warm regards
Manjindar / Residence Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
장기 출장 때문에 자카르타의 5성급 레지던스는 거의 다 묵어 보았습니다. 그 중 여러 가지 면에서 거의 최고라 할 수 있습니다. 

현재 랭킹이 81위인데, 리뷰 갯수가 많지 않다 보니 오픈 초기의 낮은 평점들이 영향을 주기 때문인 것 같습니다. 하지만, 리뷰가 많아질수록 20위권에는 충분히 들 수 있을 거라 봅니다.

최고 장점은 뮈니뭐니해도 룸시설입니다. 2015년 오픈하여 침대 가구 욕실 주방 TV 전기제품 모두 최신입니다. 인테리어도 매우 고급스럽습니다. (특히, ASCOTT JAKARTA 와는 비교도 안 되게 좋습니다)

수영장, 피트니스, 농구장, 테니스장도 매우 넓고 깨끗합니다. 특히 수영 좋아하시는 분은 상당히 좋아하실 겁니다.

조식도 호텔보다는 당연히 못 하지만 레지던스 중에서는 매우 괜찮은 편입니다. 룸서비스가 안 되는 단점이 있지만, 롯데쇼핑과 바로 연결되어 있어 전혀 불편하지 않습니다. 특히 한국음식 없으면 못 산다 하시는 분께는 최고의 입지입니다. 쇼핑몰 지하에는 대형 슈퍼(랜치마켓)도 있습니다.

교통은 메가쿠닝안 지역이 워낙 막히다 보니 다소 어려울 때가 많습니다. 특히, 수디르만 쪽에 일이 많다면 돌아갈 때 상당한 체증을 고려해야 합니다.

단점은 위에도 썼지만,
- 룸서비스 안 됨
- 워낙 막히는 지역임
- 택시가 잘 없음. 쇼핑몰로 나와야 함
- 객실 에어콘 소음이 좀 큼

다시 한 번, 자카르타 최고의 레지던스가 될 것임을 믿어의심치 않습니다. 가족여행, 출장자 모두 추천합니다.
title: 자카르타 레지던스 중 최고의 시설

owner_response.text:
Dear 일현한

시간을 내어 트립어드바이저에 경험을 게시하고 공유해 주셔서 감사합니다.

2015년 개장 기간 동안 객실 및 시설을 포함한 서비스에 대한 귀하의 리뷰를 읽고 평가해 주셔서 감사합니다. 룸 서비스 문제에 대한 귀하의 우려를 해소할 레스토랑이 이미 있음을 알려드립니다.
 
우리 직원은 고객이 우리 서비스에 편안함을 느낀다는 것을 알게되어 항상 격려하기 때문에 귀하의 리뷰를 읽는 것을 기쁘게 생각합니다.

귀하의 리뷰와 추천은 높이 평가되며 다음에 Ascott Kuningan Jakarta에 머무를 때 다시 당신을 환영하기를 기대합니다.

Thank you and Regards,


A. Haris Sumarwan
Residence Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: 仕事で１０泊ほどしたホテル。以前は向かいのSomersetに宿泊していたが、設備が古く、アスコットに変更。ジムやプール、ラウンジなどの設備が整っており快適。さらに、ロッテモールに隣接しているので、食事、買い物にも便利。
title: 新しく設備も整っている
